FORM.SCRIPT: if 3==UISelf:GetBuildIndex() then local kPos = UISelf:GetTextPos() kPos:SetX(108) UISelf:SetTextPos(kPos) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kParent = UISelf:GetParent() if not kParent:IsNil() then local kEdit = kParent:GetControl("EDT_GUILD_SEARCH") if not kEdit:IsNil() then SearchGuild(kEdit:GetEditText()) end end

local kParent = UISelf:GetParent() local kHidden = kParent:GetControl("FRM_HIDDEN_CURRENT_PAGE") local kCurrentPage = kHidden:GetCustomDataAsInt() local kPrePage = kCurrentPage - 1 UpdateEntranceOpenGuildUI(kPrePage)

local kParent = UISelf:GetParent() local kHidden = kParent:GetControl("FRM_HIDDEN_CURRENT_PAGE") local kCurrentPage = kHidden:GetCustomDataAsInt() local kNextPage = kCurrentPage + 1 UpdateEntranceOpenGuildUI(kNextPage)

FORM.SCRIPT: if 3 ~= UISelf:GetUVIndex() then CallToolTipText(0, UISelf:GetCustomDataAsStr(), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation(), "ToolTip2", 11 ) end
if 3 ~= UISelf:GetUVIndex() then CallToolTipText(0, UISelf:GetCustomDataAsStr(), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation(), "ToolTip2", 11 ) end
if 3 ~= UISelf:GetUVIndex() then CallToolTipText(0, UISelf:GetCustomDataAsStr(), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation(), "ToolTip2", 11 ) end
if 3 ~= UISelf:GetUVIndex() then CallToolTipText(0, UISelf:GetCustomDataAsStr(), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation(), "ToolTip2", 11 ) end
if 3 ~= UISelf:GetUVIndex() then CallToolTipText(0, UISelf:GetCustomDataAsStr(), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation(), "ToolTip2", 11 ) end
if 3 ~= UISelf:GetUVIndex() then CallToolTipText(0, UISelf:GetCustomDataAsStr(), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation(), "ToolTip2", 11 ) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kOwnerGuid = UISelf:GetOwnerGuid() if false == kOwnerGuid:IsNil() then OnClick_EmporiaChallengeBattle( kOwnerGuid ) end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetBuildIndex() == 0 then OnClickEmporiaBattleHelp(kSelf) end

EDIT.HOTKEY: local kWnd = UISelf:GetParent() if false==kWnd:IsNil() then OnClickEmporiaChallengeBattle(kWnd:GetControl("BTN_OK")) return true end
local kWnd = UISelf:GetParent() if false==kWnd:IsNil() then OnClickEmporiaChallengeBattle(kWnd:GetControl("BTN_OK")) return true end
if false==UISelf:GetEditText():IsNil() then UISelf:SetEditText("") else UISelf:CloseParent() end return true

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: if UISelf:GetBuildIndex() == 0 then UISelf:SetStaticText(GetTT(400908):GetStr()) elseif UISelf:GetBuildIndex() == 1 then UISelf:SetStaticText(GetTT(400914):GetStr()) else UISelf:SetStaticText(GetTT(71550):GetStr()) end
if UISelf:GetBuildIndex() == 0 then UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true) else UISelf:LockClick(false) UISelf:CheckState(false) end

EDIT_MULTI.SCRIPT: local kTemp = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if kTemp == 0 then UISelf:SetEditFocus(true) UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kListWnd = UISelf:GetParent():GetParent() if false==kListWnd:IsNil() then ODS("FRM_EMPORIA_SHOP_ITEM Parent" .. kListWnd:GetID():GetStr() .." \n") local kItem = kListWnd:ListFirstItem() while false == kItem:IsNil() do local kItemWnd = kItem:GetWnd() local kBtnWnd = kItemWnd:GetControl("CBTN_SELECT") if false == kBtnWnd:IsNil() then kBtnWnd:CheckState(false) end kItem = kListWnd:ListNextItem(kItem) end end
